# init(text:)

**Initializer**

Initializes a new label object with a text string.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor convenience init(text: String?)
```

```swift
convenience init(text: String?)
```

## Parameters

- **text**: The text to use to initialize the label node.

## Return Value

An initialized label object.

## Discussion

The label node’s font is set to Helvetica Neue Ultra Light, 32 point.

## Creating a Label

- **init(fontNamed:)**: Initializes a new label object with a specified font.
- **init(attributedText:)**: Initializes a new label object with an attributed text string.
